list.title: Espresso
list.description: A strong, black coffee brewed by forcing steam through ground coffee beans.

list.title: Cappuccino
list.description: Espresso with steamed milk foam.

list.title: Latte
list.description: Espresso mixed with steamed milk, topped with a small amount of milk foam.

list.title: Mocha
list.description: A chocolate-flavored coffee drink made with espresso, hot milk, and cocoa powder.

list.title: Americano
list.description: Espresso with hot water added to dilute it.

list.title: Cold Brew
list.description: Coffee brewed with cold water over a long period of time.

list.title: Iced Coffee
list.description: Chilled coffee served over ice.

list.title: Macchiato
list.description: Espresso with a small amount of steamed milk.

list.title: Flat White
list.description: Espresso with steamed milk, smoother than a cappuccino.

list.title: Irish Coffee
list.description: Coffee mixed with Irish whiskey, sugar, and topped with cream.

list.title: Affogato
list.description: Vanilla ice cream topped with a shot of hot espresso.

list.title: Caramel Latte
list.description: Espresso with steamed milk, caramel syrup, and topped with whipped cream.

list.title: Croissant
list.description: A buttery, flaky, and golden croissant.

list.title: Blueberry Muffin
list.description: A soft, fluffy muffin filled with fresh blueberries.

list.title: Chocolate Chip Cookie
list.description: A classic cookie loaded with chocolate chips.

list.title: Bagel with Cream Cheese
list.description: A fresh bagel served with cream cheese.

list.title: Chocolate Croissant
list.description: A croissant filled with rich chocolate.

list.title: Pumpkin Spice Latte
list.description: Espresso with steamed milk and pumpkin spice flavor.

list.title: Matcha Latte
list.description: A green tea latte made with matcha powder and steamed milk.

list.title: Chai Latte
list.description: A spiced tea blend with steamed milk.
